title: Can't access riot tristana
body: created a new account and wanted to get free skin, likes facebook page but it says that code i am trying to access is no longer available :(

replies.body:
If the code for Riot Tristana isn't working, don't fret! If you goto our [support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and submit a ticket for this, we may be able to get this working for you.

We'll be sure to respond as soon as we can ^_^!
